body_html:
The problem is exacly as I suspected - you run the GramMatrix code entirely in fp16 tensors. Change

style_targets = [GramMatrix()(A).detach().cuda() for A in vgg(style_image, style_layers)]

to

style_targets = [GramMatrix()(A.float()).detach().cuda() for A in vgg(style_image, style_layers)]

to get rid of the error message.

body:
The problem is exacly as I suspected - you run the `GramMatrix` code entirely in `fp16` tensors. Change
```python
style_targets = [GramMatrix()(A).detach().cuda() for A in vgg(style_image, style_layers)]
```
to
```python
style_targets = [GramMatrix()(A.float()).detach().cuda() for A in vgg(style_image, style_layers)]
```
to get rid of the error message.
